attributes.action: STOP THE GENOCIDE AND TORTURE OF INNOCENT TAMIL PEOPLE IN SRILANKA! Is the UK government and UN doing enough?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Innocent Tamil people are dying, being Women being raped,abducted!! loads of tamil people have been displaced from there homes.Theres no shelter nor food nor toilet facilities. there has been no help going to the tamil people in Srilanka from the UK government! It is about time the UK listen to the tamils side of what is REALLY happening.
This petition is to get an answer and make sure the UK understand the truth about who are the sufferers in Srilanka!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
